title: Pixel 2 official Android 10 update issue: Stuck on G logo loading page
content:
I've just downloaded the official Android 10 update on my Pixel 2. After the installation, it prompt me to restart the phone. I proceed to restart my phone and now it's stuck in the G logo loading page, and would not get into the home screen. I've tried a couple of things, and listed the outcomes below.

1) when holding down power button for long duration, 
- it just keep looping the Google and G logo page.

2) when holding power + volume down buttons,
- Start: goes back to G logo loading page
- Restart bootloader: back to Bootloader page
- Download mode: back to bootloader page
- Recovery mode: a quick google page then goes straight to "No command"
- Barcodes: showed 3 barcodes
- Power off: phone shut down

What should I do now? FYI I'm from Australia.
